::Triggerhappy(and Blowpipe)/Skullgrin::

         Triggerhappy swerves aro=
und in jet mode, and fires 2 shots from each photon cannon at Astro Train. =
 Blowpipe, who is in Triggerhappy's cockpit, opens it up and fires 2 shots =
each from his lasers(making 4 lasers in total).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
       Skullgrin laughs.

       "Did ya hear that, Maximal=
?  I might just have a good day today!!!!!  Why, you may ask?  Oh you'll se=
e!  And it won't be pretty," He taunted Condor.

       Skullgrin then had =
an idea.  He opened his com to Astroblast.

        "Astroblast, before we =
terminate this little Maximal let's have Beastbox and Squawktalk interrogat=
e him," He sugeested.
